Name: SATUS
About the game: Easy mechanics, hard tactics Create different units to fight! It's easy to manage big army, but it's hard to win. Every unit has its own abilities. Magicians have bonus against virus, virus against dwarfs, dwarfs against dark side, dark side against magicians. Be careful Manage your economy! You should produce money and food. Every turn you capital consumes food. If you have no enough food for capital, you will die. Use money to build producing buildings(fror example crystal farms or beer factories) Dangers are waiting for you Offers Different buildings and units Armageddon system Angry skeletons Interesting unique mechanics Simple but interesting economics Good mood
